Reference

DIANE User Interface

run_app()

Run the Shiny Application

Pre-processing

normalize()

Normalize raw count data

filter_low_counts()

Remove low count genes

Differential expression analysis

estimateDEGs()

estimateDEGs

estimateDispersion()

estimateDispersion

Expression based clustering

run_coseq()

run_coseq

get_genes_in_cluster()

get_genes_in_cluster

fit_glm()

Fits a Poisson generalized linear model to a set of genes

Gene ontologies and annotations

enrich_go()

Computes enrich Gene Ontology terms in a set of genes

convert_from_agi()

For Arabdopsis thaliana, converts TAIR IDs to entrez IDs, gene symbol or description

convert_from_ensembl()

For Homo sapiens, converts ensembl IDs to entrez IDs, symbol or name,

get_gene_information()

Gives gene information (common name and description) for a specific organism

Gene regulatory network inference

network_data()

Creates data compatible with visNetwork from an igraph object

network_inference()

Genie3 regulatory importances estimation

network_thresholding()

Thresholds a non sparse adjascency matrix to return the strongest weights only

Visualization functions

draw_coseq_run()

draw_coseq_run : displays the indications of clustering

draw_DEGs()

MA or volcano plot for Differential expression

draw_distributions()

draw_distributions of count data

draw_enrich_go()

Plot the enriched go terms of an enrich_go result

draw_glm()

Plots the value of a Poisson generalized linear model coefficients

draw_heatmap()

Draw heatmap

draw_MDS()

Multi-dimensional scaling plot

draw_network()

Displays an interactive network view, with regulators as green sqaure nodes.

draw_network_degrees()

Plots the histogram of in and out degrees, betweeness of regultors and target genes.

draw_PCA()

Draw variables along principal PCA components

draw_profiles()

Draw profiles of a clustering

Data

regulators_per_organism

List of regulator genes for a number of model organisms

abiotic_stresses

Combined abiotic stresses

gene_annotations

Gene annotations for supported organisms in DIANE
